author: Grzegorz Nowicki
description: A splash of prosecco adds vitality to what is a simple, but beautifully balanced rum and pineapple cocktail.
name: Celebration (by Grzegorz Nowicki)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass TOP with prosecco
*Special ingredient #1: Pineapple cordial made by blending 900g of pineapple flesh with 450g of simple syrup (1:1
5) and straining through a cheesecloth; add 4g tartaric acid
